::: Transanulas watches them take Darkmouse away, his lunch. He had put up a 
good fight for her, but now she was gone. Unfortunetly for Ursa Major, her 
body was still dad and freash. The spider took it, and left to devour it 
slowly. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast woke up to see Gremlin, Marine, and jackle returning fire on 
someone. He had been out for only moments but could see his forces were 
taking much damage. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Argh! Kill them! I want them destroyed! Get Brightblade, 
Gangon, Mosquitor, Inferno, Rampage, Tankkor, and Scorpinox here now! We need 
back up!

::: Gremlin ::: Sir, yes sir!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set and Ominous try to hit Hell Beast, but he ducks and returns fire 
which sends Ominous slamming into a tree. Now, Set must finish it. :::

::: Set ::: Damn, well at least we got rid of Ursa Major!
